        System.out.println("è·å– test èŠ‚ç‚¹ ç›‘å¬å™¨ : " + event);
    }
}).forPath("/test");

    # ç¼“å­˜çš„ç›‘å¬æ¨¡å¼

    Curatorå¼•å…¥äº†Cacheæ¥å®ç°å¯¹ZookeeperæœåŠ¡ç«¯äº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬ï¼ŒCacheäº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬å¯ä»¥ç†è§£ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªæœ¬åœ°ç¼“å­˜è§†å›¾ä¸è¿œç¨‹Zookeeperè§†å›¾çš„å¯¹æ¯”è¿‡ç¨‹ã€‚Cacheæä¾›äº†åå¤æ³¨å†Œçš„åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚Cacheåˆ†ä¸ºä¸¤ç±»æ³¨å†Œç±»å‹ï¼šèŠ‚ç‚¹ç›‘å¬å’Œå­èŠ‚ç‚¹ç›‘å¬ã€‚

    Cacheçš„ç›‘å¬æ¨¡å¼ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç†è§£ä¸ºåˆ©ç”¨äº†ä¸€ä¸ªç¼“å­˜çš„æœºåˆ¶ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶Cacheæä¾›äº†åå¤æ³¨å†Œçš„åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚ç®€å•æ¥è¯´Cacheå°±æ˜¯åœ¨å®¢æˆ·ç«¯ç¼“å­˜äº†æŒ‡å®šèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œå½“æ„ŸçŸ¥åˆ°ZNodeçš„èŠ‚ç‚¹å˜åŒ–çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œå°±ä¼šè§¦å‘eventäº‹ä»¶ï¼Œæ³¨å†Œçš„ç›‘å¬å™¨å°±ä¼šå¤„ç†è¿™ä¸ªäº‹ä»¶ã€‚

    # node cache

    //path ç›‘å¬è·¯å¾„
public NodeCache(CuratorFramework client,String path)

    é€šè¿‡æ³¨å†Œç›‘å¬å™¨æ¥å®ç°ï¼Œå¯¹å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°æ®å˜åŒ–çš„å¤„ç†

    
public void addListener(NodeCacheListener listener)

    ä»£ç ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼š

         String nodePath = "/watch";

        //1.åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸€ä¸ªnodeCache
        NodeCache nodeCache = new NodeCache(curatorFramework, nodePath, false);

        //2.åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸€ä¸ªNodeCacheListener
        NodeCacheListener nodeCacheListener = new NodeCacheListener() {
            @Override
            public void nodeChanged() throws Exception {
                ChildData childData = nodeCache.getCurrentData();
                System.out.println("ZNode èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„çŠ¶æ€å˜åŒ–,path=" + childData.getPath());
                System.out.println("ZNode èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„çŠ¶æ€å˜åŒ–,data=" + new String(childData.getData(), "utf-8"));
                System.out.println("ZNode èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„çŠ¶æ€å˜åŒ–,stat=" + childData.getStat());
            }
        };

        nodeCache.getListenable().addListener(nodeCacheListener);
        /**
         * å”¯ä¸€çš„ä¸€ä¸ªå‚æ•°buildInitialä»£è¡¨ç€æ˜¯å¦å°†è¯¥èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„æ•°æ®ç«‹å³è¿›è¡Œç¼“å­˜ã€‚
         * å¦‚æœè®¾ç½®ä¸ºtrueçš„è¯ï¼Œåœ¨startå¯åŠ¨æ—¶ç«‹å³è°ƒç”¨NodeCacheçš„getCurrentDataæ–¹æ³•å°±èƒ½å¤Ÿå¾—åˆ°å¯¹åº”èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„ä¿¡æ¯ChildDataç±»ï¼Œ
         * å¦‚æœè®¾ç½®ä¸ºfalseçš„å°±å¾—ä¸åˆ°å¯¹åº”çš„ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚
         *
         * ä½¿ç”¨NodeCacheæ¥ç›‘å¬èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„äº‹ä»¶
         */
        nodeCache.start();//start

        curatorFramework.create().forPath(nodePath);
        // ç¬¬1æ¬¡å˜æ›´èŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°æ®
        curatorFramework.setData().forPath(nodePath, "hello".getBytes());
        Thread.sleep(1000);

        // ç¬¬2æ¬¡å˜æ›´èŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°æ®
        curatorFramework.setData().forPath(nodePath, "world".getBytes());

        Thread.sleep(1000);

        // ç¬¬3æ¬¡å˜æ›´èŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°æ®
        curatorFramework.setData().forPath(nodePath, "hello world".getBytes());
        Thread.sleep(1000);

        //ç›®çš„æ˜¯é˜»å¡å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å…³é—­
        System.in.read();

    ZNode èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„çŠ¶æ€å˜åŒ–,path=/watch ZNode èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„çŠ¶æ€å˜åŒ–,data=hello ZNode èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„çŠ¶æ€å˜åŒ–,stat=415,416,1657780730498,1657780730505,1,0,0,0,5,0,415

    ZNode èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„çŠ¶æ€å˜åŒ–,path=/watch ZNode èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„çŠ¶æ€å˜åŒ–,data=world ZNode èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„çŠ¶æ€å˜åŒ–,stat=415,417,1657780730498,1657780731524,2,0,0,0,5,0,415

    ZNode èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„çŠ¶æ€å˜åŒ–,path=/watch ZNode èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„çŠ¶æ€å˜åŒ–,data=hello world ZNode èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„çŠ¶æ€å˜åŒ–,stat=415,418,1657780730498,1657780732534,3,0,0,0,11,0,415

    # path cache

    PathChildrenCacheä¼šå¯¹å­èŠ‚ç‚¹è¿›è¡Œç›‘å¬ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ä¸ä¼šå¯¹äºŒçº§å­èŠ‚ç‚¹è¿›è¡Œç›‘å¬ã€‚

    public PathChildrenCache(CuratorFramework client,String path,boolean cacheData)

    é€šè¿‡æ³¨å†Œç›‘å¬å™¨æ¥å®ç°ï¼Œå¯¹å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å­èŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°æ®å˜åŒ–çš„å¤„ç†

    public void addListener(PathChildrenCacheListener listener)

    ä»£ç ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼š

    
        String nodePath = "/watchNode";

        curatorFramework.create().forPath(nodePath);

        PathChildrenCache pathChildrenCache = new PathChildrenCache(curatorFramework, nodePath, true);
        PathChildrenCacheListener pathChildrenCacheListener = new PathChildrenCacheListener() {
            @Override
            public void childEvent(CuratorFramework curatorFramework, PathChildrenCacheEvent pathChildrenCacheEvent) throws Exception {
                ChildData childData = pathChildrenCacheEvent.getData();
                switch (pathChildrenCacheEvent.getType()) {
                    case CHILD_ADDED:
                        System.out.println("å­èŠ‚ç‚¹å¢åŠ ï¼Œpath=" + childData.getPath() + ",data=" + new String(childData.getData(), "utf-8"));
                        break;
                    case CHILD_UPDATED:
                        System.out.println("å­èŠ‚ç‚¹æ›´æ–°ï¼Œpath=" + childData.getPath() + ",data=" + new String(childData.getData(), "utf-8"));
                        break;
                    case CHILD_REMOVED:
                        System.out.println("å­èŠ‚ç‚¹åˆ é™¤ï¼Œpath=" + childData.getPath() + ",data=" + new String(childData.getData(), "utf-8"));
                        break;
                    default:
                        break;
                }
            }
        };

        pathChildrenCache.getListenable().addListener(pathChildrenCacheListener);
        pathChildrenCache.start(PathChildrenCache.StartMode.BUILD_INITIAL_CACHE);

        Thread.sleep(1000);
        for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
            String childPath = nodePath + "/" + i;
            byte[] data = childPath.getBytes();
            curatorFramework.create().forPath(childPath, data);
        }

        //ä¸»çº¿ç¨‹ç¡çœ ï¼Œç„¶åå†åˆ é™¤å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œä¾æ—§ä¼šè§¦å‘å­èŠ‚ç‚¹å˜æ›´äº‹ä»¶
        Thread.sleep(5000);
        for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
            String childPath = nodePath + "/" + i;
            curatorFramework.delete().forPath(childPath);
        }

    å­èŠ‚ç‚¹å¢åŠ ï¼Œpath=/watchNode/0,data=/watchNode/0 å­èŠ‚ç‚¹å¢åŠ ï¼Œpath=/watchNode/1,data=/watchNode/1 å­èŠ‚ç‚¹å¢åŠ ï¼Œpath=/watchNode/2,data=/watchNode/2 å­èŠ‚ç‚¹åˆ é™¤ï¼Œpath=/watchNode/0,data=/watchNode/0 å­èŠ‚ç‚¹åˆ é™¤ï¼Œpath=/watchNode/1,data=/watchNode/1 å­èŠ‚ç‚¹åˆ é™¤ï¼Œpath=/watchNode/2,data=/watchNode/2

    # tree cache

    TreeCacheä½¿ç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªå†…éƒ¨ç±»TreeNodeæ¥ç»´æŠ¤è¿™ä¸ªä¸€ä¸ªæ ‘ç»“æ„ã€‚å¹¶å°†è¿™ä¸ªæ ‘ç»“æ„ä¸ZKèŠ‚ç‚¹è¿›è¡Œäº†æ˜ å°„ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥TreeCacheå¯ä»¥ç›‘å¬å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸‹æ‰€æœ‰èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„äº‹ä»¶ã€‚

    public TreeCache(CuratorFramework client,String path,boolean cacheData)

    é€šè¿‡æ³¨å†Œç›‘å¬å™¨æ¥å®ç°ï¼Œå¯¹å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼ŒåŠé€’å½’å­èŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°æ®å˜åŒ–çš„å¤„ç†ã€‚

    public void addListener(TreeCacheListener listener)

    ä»£ç ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼š

    String nodePath = "/watch";

TreeCache treeCache = new TreeCache(curatorFramework, nodePath);
TreeCacheListener treeCacheListener = new TreeCacheListener() {
    @Override
    public void childEvent(CuratorFramework curatorFramework, TreeCacheEvent treeCacheEvent) throws Exception {
        ChildData data = treeCacheEvent.getData();
        switch (treeCacheEvent.getType()) {
            case NODE_ADDED:
                System.out.println("[TreeNode]èŠ‚ç‚¹å¢åŠ ï¼Œpath="+data.getPath()+",data="+new String(data.getData(),"utf-8"));
                break;
            case NODE_UPDATED:
                System.out.println("[TreeNode]èŠ‚ç‚¹æ›´æ–°ï¼Œpath="+data.getPath()+",data="+new String(data.getData(),"utf-8"));
                break;
            case NODE_REMOVED:
                System.out.println("[TreeNode]èŠ‚ç‚¹åˆ é™¤ï¼Œpath="+data.getPath()+",data="+new String(data.getData(),"utf-8"));
                break;
            default:
                break;
        }
    }
};

treeCache.getListenable().addListener(treeCacheListener);

treeCache.start();
Thread.sleep(1000);
for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
    String childPath = nodePath + "/" + i;
    byte[] data = childPath.getBytes();
    curatorFramework.create().creatingParentsIfNeeded().forPath(childPath, data);
}

Thread.sleep(1000);
for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
    String childPath = nodePath + "/" + i;
    curatorFramework.delete().forPath(childPath);
}

curatorFramework.setData().forPath(nodePath,"update parent".getBytes());

    [TreeNode]èŠ‚ç‚¹å¢åŠ ï¼Œpath=/watch,data=update parent [TreeNode]èŠ‚ç‚¹å¢åŠ ï¼Œpath=/watch/0,data=/watch/0 [TreeNode]èŠ‚ç‚¹å¢åŠ ï¼Œpath=/watch/1,data=/watch/1 [TreeNode]èŠ‚ç‚¹å¢åŠ ï¼Œpath=/watch/2,data=/watch/2 [TreeNode]èŠ‚ç‚¹åˆ é™¤ï¼Œpath=/watch/0,data=/watch/0 [TreeNode]èŠ‚ç‚¹åˆ é™¤ï¼Œpath=/watch/1,data=/watch/1 [TreeNode]èŠ‚ç‚¹åˆ é™¤ï¼Œpath=/watch/2,data=/watch/2 [TreeNode]èŠ‚ç‚¹æ›´æ–°ï¼Œpath=/watch,data=update parent
